content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":148581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうか、どうか、貴方の手で殺して下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please, please, kill me with your own hands.\""},{"lineNumber":148582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、構わないよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I don't mind...\""},{"lineNumber":148583,"originalJapaneseLine":"多くの言葉は必要としない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Not many words were needed."},{"lineNumber":148584,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクがファーレンの頬に触れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselring touched Fahren's cheek."},{"lineNumber":148585,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……私、好きでした……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... I loved it..."},{"lineNumber":148586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケッセルリンク様のこの大きな手が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Your large hands, Lord Kesselring...\""},{ "lineNumber": 148587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シャロンさんがよく仰っていました……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ms. Sharon often said..."},{"lineNumber":148588,"originalJapaneseLine":"　永遠こそが幸せなのだと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Eternity itself is happiness...\""},{ "lineNumber": 148589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今なら、分かる気がします……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, I think I understand...\""},{ "lineNumber": 148590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so...\""},{"lineNumber":148591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当に……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Truly..."},{"lineNumber":148592,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケッセルリンク様とお会いできて良かった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm glad I was able to meet you, Lord Kesselring...\""},{"lineNumber":148593,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうか、ケッセルリンク様……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please, Lord Kesselring..."},{"lineNumber":148594,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この幸せを……永遠にして下さい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Make this happiness... eternal...\""},{ "lineNumber": 148595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ああ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah.\""},{"lineNumber":148596,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今はただ、ゆっくりと眠りなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For now, just sleep peacefully.\""},{"lineNumber":148597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「愛しているよ、ファーレン」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I love you, Fahren.\""},{"lineNumber":148598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私も……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I too..."},{"lineNumber":148599,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お慕い申し上げております……","translatedEnglishLine":"Adore you deeply..."},{"lineNumber":148600,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケッセルリンク様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Kesselring...\""},{"lineNumber":148601,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクが念じる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselring willed it."},{"lineNumber":148602,"originalJapaneseLine":"たったそれだけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"With just that,"},{"lineNumber":148603,"originalJapaneseLine":"メイドのファーレンは眠るように","translatedEnglishLine":"the maid Fahren fell asleep as if in a slumber."},{"lineNumber":148604,"originalJapaneseLine":"その短い生涯に幕を閉じた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Thus ended her short life."},{"lineNumber":148605,"originalJapaneseLine":"その死に顔は、","translatedEnglishLine":"Her face in death,"},{"lineNumber":148606,"originalJapaneseLine":"親に抱きしめられる赤子のように","translatedEnglishLine":"was peaceful, like a child being embraced by a parent."},{"lineNumber":148607,"originalJapaneseLine":"安らかなものだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was serene."},{"lineNumber":148608,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクは立ち上がると、","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselring stood up,"},{"lineNumber":148609,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が消えていった方向に目をやった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and looked in the direction where Rance and the others had disappeared."},{"lineNumber":148610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「名を……ランスと言ったな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The name... was Rance, wasn't it...\""},{ "lineNumber": 148611,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは腹の底から冷えるような","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a cold voice that chilled to the core."},{"lineNumber":148612,"originalJapaneseLine":"冷たい声をしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a cold voice."},{"lineNumber":148613,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラング・バウ――","translatedEnglishLine":"Lang Bau—"},{"lineNumber":148614,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの部屋――","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance's room—"},{"lineNumber":148615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やってしもうたなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We've messed up, haven't we?\""},{"lineNumber":148616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ？　何がだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? What do you mean?\""},{"lineNumber":148617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「女の子とちちくり合っておらず、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Instead of fooling around with girls,"},{"lineNumber":148618,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっさとケッセルリンクを","translatedEnglishLine":"we should have quickly stabbed Kesselring"},{"lineNumber":148619,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂で突き刺しとれば終わったのに」","translatedEnglishLine":"with me and ended this.\""},{"lineNumber":148620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うるさい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shut up!"},{"lineNumber":148621,"originalJapaneseLine":"　据え膳食わない俺じゃないのだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not the type to pass up a ready meal!\""},{"lineNumber":148622,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hah.\""},{"lineNumber":148623,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、その溜め息は！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's with that sigh?!\""},{ "lineNumber": 148624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いつもいつも儂の助言を聞かないからこうなる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This happens every time because you never listen to my advice."},{"lineNumber":148625,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たまにはいい薬よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sometimes you need a good dose of medicine.\""},{"lineNumber":148626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだとー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What did you say!?\""},{"lineNumber":148627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance,"},{"lineNumber":148628,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケッセルリンクの新情報が来ました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"there's new information about Kesselring...\""},{"lineNumber":148629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、そうか、話せ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, is that so? Tell me.\""},{"lineNumber":148630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「数時間前に大規模な魔軍の侵攻で都市が一つ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A few hours ago, a city was attacked by a large-scale demon army invasion"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうか、どうか、貴方の手で殺して下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please, please, kill me with your own hands."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの言葉は必要としない。
ケッセルリンクがファーレンの頬に触れる。
ケッセルリンク様のこの大きな手が……」
「シャロンさんがよく仰っていました……
永遠こそが幸せなのだと……」
ケッセルリンク様とお会いできて良かった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm glad I was able to meet you, Lord Kesselring..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この幸せを……永遠にして下さい……」
「今はただ、ゆっくりと眠りなさい」
お慕い申し上げております……
ケッセルリンクが念じる。
メイドのファーレンは眠るように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the maid Fahren fell asleep as if in a slumber.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その短い生涯に幕を閉じた。
親に抱きしめられる赤子のように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was peaceful, like a child being embraced by a parent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクは立ち上がると、
ランス達が消えていった方向に目をやった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and looked in the direction where Rance and the others had disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは腹の底から冷えるような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a cold voice that chilled to the core.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女の子とちちくり合っておらず、
さっさとケッセルリンクを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we should have quickly stabbed Kesselring

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂で突き刺しとれば終わったのに」
据え膳食わない俺じゃないのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not the type to pass up a ready meal!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつもいつも儂の助言を聞かないからこうなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This happens every time because you never listen to my advice.
Sometimes you need a good dose of medicine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクの新情報が来ました……」
「数時間前に大規模な魔軍の侵攻で都市が一つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A few hours ago, a city was attacked by a large-scale demon army invasion

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
